title: Azir Q and W Bugged.
body:
Azir's Q range is bugged in a way that makes the intended range of the soldier go waaaaaaaaaaaay out of bounds of the circle indicator. I'm not sure if this was a feature before as I haven't played Azir in a while.

The second bug is with he W, his Soldier Summon. It no longer has a range indicator of his soldier, instead showing a target indicator with text at the bottom that reads 'This is an invalid target.' The skill itself works normally.

replies.body: This should be fix with the upcoming patch. Thanks for the report!
